text: Edward king gret mine bissopes and mine eorles & mine schyrreuen & alle mine þeigenes on þam schyren þær Reinbold min Preost hæfeð lond & men inne freondliche.

& ic cuþe eow þæt ic wolle þæt he beo his saca wurð & his socnes ofer his lond & ofer his men & tolnes wrth & theames & infangeneþeofes eægþar ge binne buruh ge buten swa full & swa forð swa ænig his forgengena toforen him formest weren on Cnutes kinges daie & þæt his wite beo eall swa muchell swa þæt leodbiscopes æt ællan þingan.
& ic nelle nenne man geþauian þæt him from hond teo ænig þære þinga þæs þe ic him geunne habbe.
